title: 2021 Golden Globe Awards: The Winners
sub_head: Here is a list of the nominees and winners for the mostly virtual award ceremony that honors work in movies and television series
body:
Here are the winners of the 78th Golden Globe Awards:

Winner:Daniel Kaluuya, “Judas and the Black Messiah”
Sacha Baron Cohen, “The Trial of the Chicago 7”
Jared Leto, “The Little Things”
